statements: SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste WHERE industry_id = 1;
SELECT waste_type, quantity FROM hazardous_waste WHERE quantity > 1000;
SELECT industry_id, waste_type FROM hazardous_waste WHERE waste_type LIKE '%chemical%';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste ORDER BY waste_type DESC;
SELECT industry_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM hazardous_waste GROUP BY industry_id;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste WHERE waste_type = 'Medical waste' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT industry_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM hazardous_waste GROUP BY industry_id;
SELECT industry_id, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM hazardous_waste GROUP BY industry_id ORDER BY waste_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste WHERE industry_id = 1 AND quantity > 1000;
SELECT industry_id, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM hazardous_waste GROUP BY industry_id HAVING MAX(quantity) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_types;
SELECT type_name, industry_type FROM hazardous_waste_types WHERE id = 1;
SELECT type_name FROM hazardous_waste_types WHERE industry_type = 'Chemical';
SELECT id, quantity FROM hazardous_waste_quantities WHERE industry_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_quantities ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_types WHERE id = 1
SELECT type_name, industry_type FROM hazardous_waste_types ORDER BY type_name DESC
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_quantities WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY waste_type_id
SELECT type_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM hazardous_waste_types INNER JOIN hazardous_waste_quantities ON hazardous_waste_types.id = waste_type_id GROUP BY type_name
SELECT industry_type, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM hazardous_waste_types GROUP BY industry_type HAVING waste_count > 1
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_types;
SELECT type_name, type_id FROM hazardous_waste_types ORDER BY type_name ASC;
SELECT industry_id, industry_name FROM industries WHERE location='USA';
SELECT type_name, quantity FROM hazardous_waste_types JOIN hazardous_waste_quantities ON hazardous_waste_types.type_id = hazardous_waste_quantities.type_id;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_quantities WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT type_name, quantity FROM hazardous_waste_types JOIN hazardous_waste_quantities ON hazardous_waste_types.type_id = hazardous_waste_quantities.type_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY type_name ASC
SELECT * FROM industries WHERE location LIKE '%California%'

SELECT industry_name, sum(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM industries JOIN hazardous_waste_quantities ON industries.industry_id = hazardous_waste_quantities.industry_id GROUP BY industry_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT industry_name, location, quantity FROM industries JOIN hazardous_waste_quantities ON industries.industry_id = hazardous_waste_quantities.industry_id ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT type_name AS waste_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM hazardous_waste_types JOIN hazardous_waste_quantities ON hazardous_waste_types.type_id = hazardous_waste_quantities.type_id GROUP BY type_name HAVING total_quantity > 5000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_types;
SELECT type_id, type_name FROM hazardous_waste_types WHERE type_name = 'Chemical';
SELECT industry_name, industry_type FROM industries ORDER BY industry_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_generation WHERE quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM industries WHERE industry_type = 'Manufacturing' LIMIT 10;
SELECT record_id, quantity FROM waste_generation WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY date_generated DESC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM hazardous_waste_types WHERE type_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_location LIKE '%dump%' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;

SELECT industry_name, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM industries JOIN waste_generation ON industries.industry_id = waste_generation.industry_id GROUP BY industry_name HAVING total_disposals > 5 ORDER BY total_disposals DESC;
SELECT * FROM industries LIMIT 5;
SELECT industry_name FROM industries WHERE industry_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste WHERE quantity > 1000;
SELECT site_name, location FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;

SELECT waste_generation.generation_date, waste_generation.generation_quantity, hazardous_waste.quantity FROM waste_generation INNER JOIN hazardous_waste ON waste_generation.hazardous_waste_id = hazardous_waste.hazardous_waste_id ORDER BY waste_generation.generation_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM industries;
SELECT industry_name FROM industries WHERE industry_id = 1;

SELECT industries.industry_name, waste_types.waste_type_name FROM industries JOIN hazardous_waste ON industries.industry_id = hazardous_waste.industry_id JOIN waste_types ON hazardous_waste.waste_type_id = waste_types.waste_type_id;
SELECT generation_id, generation_date, generation_quantity FROM waste_generation WHERE generation_quantity > 1000;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
